item.title: Amendments for applicants for Golden Visas in the UAE: what they change
item.description: Over the past couple of years, the demand for real estate in Dubai and in the UAE as a whole has grown significantly. Investors from all over the world have turned their eyes to the country, and the Russians are confidently among the ten most active of them - the neutral status of the Emirates in the current geopolitical situation played an important role here. According to the Dubai Land Department, the third quarter of this year broke another record, becoming the most productive in history: more than 25.
